idea-plugin.name: Minecraft Development
idea-plugin.description: Brings support for Bukkit, Spigot, Paper, Sponge, Forge, Fabric, MCP, Mixin, Velocity, BungeeCord, Waterfall, and LiteLoader projects to Intellij IDEA.
idea-plugin.change-notes: Please report issues to the issue tracker!
